description: Try our easy to follow Crab & Pasta Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Crab & Pasta Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook linguine in a large saucepan of salted water for 9 minutes or until tender as per packet instructions. Drain and return to saucepan. Add 1 tbs olive oil and toss to prevent pasta sticking.
Cook blue swimmer crabs in a saucepan for 6-7 minutes and bring to the boil.
Remove top of blue swimmer crabs and remove meat from body. Remove pulp from tomatoes and finely chop.

Shred rind of lemons and juice one (you will need 1/4 cup juice). Add lemon rind to pasta with baby capers, parsley leaves and crab meat. Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Toss to combine.

Combine lemon juice and 1/3 cup extra virgin olive oil. Season with salt and pepper. Place salad onto serving plates. Top with remaining crab meat, drizzle with dressing and garnish with parsley leaves.
